name: Cosmo III Table Lamp
description: The Cosmo III table lamp by Kifu Paris is a whimsical and sculptural piece, inlaid in cream shagreen and black pen shell with bronze-patina brass accents. This piece is a sister to the original Cosmo Lamp by Kifu Paris. The amorphous shapes on the bottom part can be moved to adjust the angle of each part. This piece is a part of the Cosmo Capsule, see images at end of slide. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti.
